mapper.sql: ${alias}.act_num as ${prefix}act_num, ${alias}.user_num as ${prefix}user_num, ${alias}.act_title as ${prefix}act_title, ${alias}.act_desc as ${prefix}act_desc, D19(${alias}.start_date) as ${prefix}start_date, D19(${alias}.end_date) as ${prefix}end_date, ${alias}.join_code as ${prefix}join_code, ${alias}.act_status as ${prefix}act_status, D19(${alias}.create_date) as ${prefix}create_date
mapper.select:
select
from activity_basic activityBasic where act_num=#{actNum}
